title: Fable & Mane Smooth & Shine Hair Oil, with UV Heat Protection. Post Wash Oil Reduces Frizz, Adds Instant Shine with Jojoba, Castor Oil and Ashwagandha (55ml)

features: A SMOOTHING OIL HAIR TREATMENT FOR A GLOSSY MANE - smooth frizz and boost shine with this potent leave in hair oil. Designed for use on damp hair, this hydrating elixir protects against heat damage up to 450*F and UV rays, for a luscious-looking mane

SUITABLE FOR ALL HAIR TYPES - infused with six nourishing fruit oils, this Ayurvedic hair serum contains Shikakai for instant shine, Ashwagandha to build resilience and strengthen hair, and Passionfruit oil to nourish dry ends and tame frizz

MAJESTIC SCENT ENRICHED WITH INDIAN SPICES - a spice blend of Indian saffron and nutmeg, paired with midnight rose damascena and Indian jasmine sambac, with a touch of incense and sandalwood gives unexpected depth to this sumptuous hair oil

SILICONE-FREE, VEGAN AND CRUELTY-FREE - inspired by the ancient Indian tradition of hair oiling to nurture your scalp and strands for a silk-like finish, this Indian hair oil is safe for coloured hair and contains no dehydrating silicones or sulphates

FABLE AND MANE HAIR OIL - unleash the power of ancient Indian beauty secrets with Fable & Mane's rejuvenating healthy hair products formulated to nourish and strengthen your mane from the inside out, because stronger hair begins with healthy roots

product_details_tab_data.Ingredients: Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Ricinus Communis (Castor) Seed Oil, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Coconut Alkanes, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Oil, Orbignya Oleifera (Babassu) Seed Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Coco Caprylate/Caprate, Tamarindus Indica Fruit Extract, Acacia Concinna Fruit Extract, Euterpe Oleracea Fruit Oil, Oenocarpus Bataua Fruit Oil, Sesamum Indicum (Sesame) Seed Oil, Mauritia Flexuosa (Buriti) Fruit Oil, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Bran Extract, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Extract, Phyllanthus Emblica Extract, Bacopa Monnieri Leaf Extract, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Withania Somnifera Root Extract, Rosmarinus Officinalis (Rosemary) Leaf Extract, Parfum (Fragrance), Phenoxyethanol, Tocopherol.
product_details_tab_data.Safety Warning: Section clean, towel-dried hair. Rub oil into palms and apply to strands from mid-lengths to ends. Use 1-2 drops for fine hair and 4-5 drops for thick hair. Blow- or air-dry and style as usual.
